com.jmr.wrapperx.client

Class HttpPostThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapperx.client.HttpPostThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HttpPostThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Networking Library HttpPostThread.java Purpose: Sends a post request to the servlet and handles the response if one is sent.
    Version:
    1.0 8/4/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

      private org.apache.http.client.HttpClient httpClient
      Used to send post and get requests over to a servlet.

      URL location of the servlet.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpPostThread(Client client, java.lang.String url, byte[] data)
      Sends a byte array of data over to a servlet without cookies.
      HttpPostThread(Client client, java.lang.String url, byte[] data, java.lang.String cookie)
      Sends a byte array of data over to a servlet with the set cookies.

      • handlePacket

        private void handlePacket(HttpSession session,
                byte[] data)
        Decrypts a byte array and handles any complex objects. Sends the object to the listener if it is formed.
        Parameters:
        session - The client's session.
        data - The data to send over.
